page.title: 07Farming.Lparish H.Priors
page.content: 04400144 There are 4 farms in our D-Block:- Andover Down Farm. 86 acres. Apsley Farm 450 acres. Manor Farm 450 acres. Middleton Park Farm.2500 acres. All farm follow the husbandry now typical of chalk downland with an overlay of clay,i.e.continuous cereals, intensive livestock and fodder with permanent pasture on the watermeadows.Autumn sown wheat and barley are the two main cereal crops. The wheat is sold for seed and biscuit flour,the barley for malting,seed or animal feed.Other crops include winter and spring beans which are high in protein and very nutritious animal feed.Dairy and Beef cattle are kept at 2 farms.One also rears pigs.Each farm has combine harvesters and tractors.
